uvi.description:
hwmon: (w83793) Fix NULL pointer dereference by removing unnecessary structure field

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.10 by commit 746011193f44f97f8784edcf8327c587946745fc. For more details please see the references link.
